page.description: Get Named Ranges defined for SpreadSheet, setitng details to .t. returns the current range associated with the name
page.prototype: GetNamedRanges as C([ details as L])
page.example:
dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.GetNamedRanges() HISCORE FIELD_HEADINGS
dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.GetNamedRanges(.t.) HISCORE=scoreboard!B9 FIELD_HEADINGS=Orders!A1:E2
